This deprived Ken Miles of his first Le Mans win and the triple crown (Daytona, Sebring, Le Mans) of Endurance racing.  Sadly, Ken Miles was killed while testing the prototype Ford J-Car at Riverside International Raceway just 2 months later.  The J-Car would be heavily modified into the the Ford GT-40 Mk.
